data.title: Furniture Store in Draper, UT
data.meta_description: Looking for a furniture store near you? Visit the Draper, UT store and find a wide selection of affordable furniture and home goods!
data.text:
IKEA Draper

Address

IKEA Draper

67 West IKEA Way

Draper, UT 84020

Store

Monday - Saturday

10:00 AM - 9:00 PM

Sunday

10:00 AM - 8:00 PM

Hej, welcome to the IKEA Draper store!

Thank you for stopping by our Draper store page. We invite you to wander our showroom of 40+ individual room settings and find your dream solution. Walking through our store, you’ll know you are in Utah, you’ll find solutions that meet the needs of how you live, and you’ll feel at home.

Our vision is to provide a better everyday life at home for the many — that means you! We make sure IKEA Draper is a great place to work, where our co-workers create an atmosphere where you’re happy and comfortable shopping. Taking care of people and our planet is not a corporate slogan at IKEA, but a way of working and a foundation of who we are. We love our community and we’re active partners throughout the Salt Lake Valley.

Our return policy is generous and even better if you belong to IKEA Family, our customer loyalty program. We also have a fantastic Swedish restaurant where you can sit down, relax, and enjoy a delicious meal.

We hope you’ll enjoy visiting IKEA Draper soon, and hope you tell us about it too!

Tracy

Store Manager

Local in-store deals

Save 15% on select sleep essentials

Ready to join the goodnight club? IKEA Family members get 15% off purchases of $300 or more (pre-tax) on bed frames, mattresses, comforters and more sleep comfort essentials during the IKEA complete sleep event until 9/10/24. Discount applied at checkout.*

Not a member? Join IKEA Family for free now.

Shop sleep essentials

Local IKEA Family in-store offers

As an IKEA Family member, you receive exclusive discounts on products throughout the store.

Last Chance

Hurry, shop these popular products before they're gone for good.

IKEA Family Members receive an extra 10% off in As-is

IKEA Family members! Visit our As-is department and receive an additional 10% off every Wednesday! Just scan your IKEA Family card at checkout and enjoy the savings!

*Offer valid only at IKEA Draper. All As-is sales are final.

The As-is section is now online!

IKEA Family members, it’s now easier than ever to browse and shop your local store’s As-is section of gently used furniture, discontinued items and more affordable furnishings online. Happy As-is shopping!

Popular categories

Visit our restaurant and try a taste of Sweden!

Take a break from shopping at the Swedish Restaurant and enjoy all your IKEA food favorites, like meatballs, veggie balls, salmon, affordable meals for kids and much more!

Swedish meatballs

Served with mashed potatoes & Lingonberry jam

Salmon fillet

Served with cauliflower rice and red pepper relish

Chicken tenders

Served with french fries

Hej Friday - Get 50% off entrées every Friday!

Slide into the weekend with 50% off adult entrées at your local IKEA store’s Swedish Restaurant every Friday until 8/31/24. Bring an appetite and a few hungry friends who love half priced meatballs, plant balls, salmon filet meals and more.

Daily Restaurant deals for IKEA Family members!

Monday: Go meatless with 8-piece veggie & plant ball plates for $3

Tuesday: Get any hot entrée for $3.99

Wednesday: Get 2 free kid’s entrées when you buy 1 adult entrée

Thursday: Get $1 off Swedish meatballs

Friday: All customers get 50% off all hot entrées

See full Terms & Conditions*

Appetizing prices, all day long!

Mac and cheese for only $3.99

Spend less on a delicious, comfort food classic! Enjoy an adult mac and cheese meal for the affordable price of just $3.99.

It’s o-fish-ial: Salmon prices are down

Spend even less on a healthy meal at the Swedish Restaurant with New lower prices on all salmon entrées! Visit your local store for prices.

IKEA Family

Everyone saves more every day with IKEA Family. Joining is the best way to make the most of your IKEA experience. Check out these great benefits to learn how you’ll be getting more for less today!

It’s all happening now at IKEA Draper!

All year round, we offer various activities and events. For example, workshops on the layout of the house, or activities for children during school holidays. Check our events regularly.... we add them all the time.

Click & Collect Order Pick-Up

What you need to know

Pick your order up at your earliest convenience.

We'll hold your order for 24 hours, after that it will be canceled.

Make sure you have enough space in your vehicle to fit your order.

Where to go

For in-store pick-up:

Park in the marked Click & Collect Order Pick-Up parking spots in the loading zone to the left of the main entrance.

Enter through the Exit doors.

How was your Click & Collect experience?

Click here to let us know how we're doing.

Returns & exchanges

On your way here for a return, spare part, or customer service issue? Jump in line before you arrive and get ahead of the crowd. View our return policy.

Services to help you shop

At IKEA, you can do everything yourself. From collecting all your products in-store, to transporting and assembling them. But of course, you don't have to. IKEA offers a wide range of useful services to help you purchase, transport and assemble your products.

Buy Back & Resell

Have IKEA furniture that needs a new home? IKEA Family members can sell select gently used IKEA furniture in exchange for in-store credit!

Learn more

Skip the line and save time!

Introducing Shop & Go! Download the IKEA app before arriving at the store, and while you shop, you can scan your items and pack them in your bag. Then just pay at the dedicated checkout lanes on your way out. No lines, no hassle!

Download the app

Salt Lake City Pick-up Point

Find directions and contact information to collect your order from our Pick-up Point.

After you have received confirmation, via email, that your order is ready for pick up, you will have 5 days to pick up your order.

Pick-up Point hours

Monday - Friday

8:00 AM - 6:00 PM

Saturday

8:00 AM - 12:00 PM

UTA on Demand

Low cost, quick, efficient transportation.

UTA On Demand is an innovative form of transportation that connects riders with other transit services like TRAX, FrontRunner, or Bus as well as to other destinations in the community.

Tell us about your experience at IKEA Draper

At IKEA Draper, we value your feedback and use it to continually improve your shopping experience. Recent updates include new digital shopping tools, new ways to pay, and improved waiting times.

Working together in our community

Drop off your glass recyclables at IKEA Draper

Together we can work to protect our environment and minimize what is sent to our Utah waste sites. Drop off your recyclable glass products at the bin on the North side of our parking lot. You can also drop off clean recyclable cardboard in the bins along the customer loading area in the front of the store, and then see our community recycling area inside the store across from the returns area.

IKEA Draper in the Community

Being a good neighbor and demonstrating commitment to our local community is an essential part of who we are at IKEA. Our priority is to take an active hands-on approach to serving the needs of our community by creating impactful actions that will be a part of real lasting change. As a company that deeply cares about people and the planet, we are guided by a simple yet powerful IKEA vision of creating a better everyday life for the many people.

IKEA Draper has committed to dedicating resources to helping our most vulnerable populations throughout Utah. Here are some of our recent contributions to our local community:

Furnished and donated resources to support the establishment of Encircle House in support of LGBTQ+ youth in Heber, UT.

Partnered with HomeAide to provide furniture and home furnishings for people coming out of chronic homelessness in The Other Side Village.

Store features & amenities

Frequently Asked Questions

We love pets, but we don't allow them in our stores. We do welcome fully trained, ADA-qualified service animals to shop with you. Animals whose sole function is to provide comfort or emotional support do not qualify as service animals under the ADA.

We offer family parking spaces close to the entrance of the store to make the transition from the parking lot into the store with your little ones much quicker. We offer many handicapped parking spots, as well as parking spots for fuel-efficient vehicles and electric vehicle (EV) charging stations.

We currently offer 2 EV Charging Stations.

We have wheelchairs available in our Store Entrance Lobby.

Motorized scooters are available in our Store Entrance Lobby.

The Click & Collect Pick-Up area can be found on the left (East) side of the building, please enter through the doors market "Click & Collect Order Pickup".

At IKEA Draper we strive to keep the importance and needs of families top of mind. Here are a few examples of simple ways we try to make your visit to IKEA Draper a great one!

We offer family parking spaces close to the entrance of the store to make the transition from the parking lot into the store with your little ones much quicker.

We offer shopping strollers in our Market Hall. With a seat for your little one, a hook for your bags, and a place to hang your big yellow bag- these shopping strollers make navigating the store much easier!

Our baby care rooms offer a diaper changing space along with a comfortable space if you need to feed your little one.

Throughout the year, we offer many Family-friendly activities, workshops and events for our IKEA Family members! Not a member? Sign up today!

In our Swedish Restaurant we offer:

Bibs

Highchairs

Bottle Warming Station

IKEA Food Kids Meals

Play Area

From Interstate 15 take exit 289 to Bangerter Hwy and turn right onto 200 West.

From Bangerter Hwy traveling East, take exit 1 toward 600 West.

IKEA Draper is located near the "Point of the Mountain".

IKEA Draper is 18 miles south of downtown Salt Lake City, on Interstate 15.

IKEA Draper is near Flex Bus stop F514.

Customers can utilize UTA On Demand to connect them with other transit option locations in the area like TRAX, FrontRunner, or Bus.

IKEA Draper is the only IKEA store located in Utah.

About the IKEA Draper furniture store

IKEA Draper, which opened its doors in Draper, Utah in 2007, is located only 10 miles south of Salt Lake City, UT at the intersection of Interstate 15 and Bangerter Highway. IKEA Draper is located near the Point of the Mountain, where Salt Lake County and Utah County converge – and you can see the Wasatch Mountains from the IKEA Draper Restaurant, which serves up tasty Swedish meatballs, kids' meals, desserts and more iconic IKEA foods. IKEA Draper is at the heart of the Salt Lake City metropolitan shopping and family area, near the Shops at South Towne, Loveland Living Planet Aquarium and Thanksgiving Point. With its close proximity to many world-class winter resorts (like Snowbird, Alta Ski area, Brighton Resort, and Solitude Mountain Resort) and Sundance Mountain Resort (the home of the world-famous Sundance Film Festival), IKEA Draper is an affordable home furnishing destination for Salt Lake City metro area residents coming from Sandy, Riverton, Bluffdale, Lehi or Midvale, as well as curious travelers from all over. At IKEA Draper, you can find unbeatable home furniture deals to improve every room in your home, including living room furniture, bedroom furniture, dining room furniture, home office furniture, children’s furniture, kitchen cabinets, kitchen appliances, bathroom furnishings and outdoor furniture. So bring the entire family for a day of fun, food and budget-friendly furniture deals you won’t want to miss!

Store ratings and reviews
